item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

Just my opinion, but I don’t think you can blame an administrator for his players conduct.
If he were to ban them for being “mean” I’d think that’s worse.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @Chronic24 Chronic24
item.description:
@Chronic24 wrote:

[quote=“oldy, post:61, topic:469045”]Crap server. Logged on for about 30mins before getting off.

Its really laggy due to not being on dedi. When asked if he was gonna put it on dedi about 6 times, he finally replied saying that “it wasnt needed. People dont understand you dont need dedi”.

As soon as i logged in Matt jumped on a few chars to make his server look populated. Then even started a new character and was training near me to make it seem as if there was people that actually played. I said “Lame server is lame” to which he replied on his noob char “your lame” then logged.

Same old ignorant admin that hosted many similar rubbish servers before with no playerbase. Not worth even going to the website.[/quote]

Might want to that computer checked. I don’t lag a bit… Maybe pay more then $20 a month for your internet that helps.

And for the Matt logging in on accounts. Never seen him do it before so doubtful.

And for people treating the new players like trash?? I have never… Guess someone decided they’d log on the server and bum for free shit and you didn’t get it is what I’m assuming so you decide to bash.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @nwehrman11 nwehrman11
item.description:
@nwehrman11 wrote:

[quote=“Vibes, post:63, topic:469045”]ok guys so now i have rethought this server and im making some serious changes!!

In edgeville:

Armour sellers, from iron to Rune,
Weapon seller from iron to Rune,
Runes Seller 50,000 stock,
Arrow and bolts seller
Master fisher now gives cooked lobster. more changes to come. Also, exp rate has been boosted a little.[/quote]

Oh good, put rune in shop right when I get the smithing to make it.

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @nwehrman11 nwehrman11
item.description:
@nwehrman11 wrote:

[quote=“oldy, post:61, topic:469045”]Crap server. Logged on for about 30mins before getting off.

Its really laggy due to not being on dedi. When asked if he was gonna put it on dedi about 6 times, he finally replied saying that “it wasnt needed. People dont understand you dont need dedi”.

As soon as i logged in Matt jumped on a few chars to make his server look populated. Then even started a new character and was training near me to make it seem as if there was people that actually played. I said “Lame server is lame” to which he replied on his noob char “your lame” then logged.

Same old ignorant admin that hosted many similar rubbish servers before with no playerbase. Not worth even going to the website.[/quote]

I have been playing for a few weeks now (including tonight obviously shortly after you stopped playing), on a POS slow ass little Acer laptop and I have never had any problems with lag, at all.

Also, how exactly do you know it was matt that ‘jumped on a bunch of chars’ to make the server look populated? I have never seen matt on any character other than ‘Matt’. What were a few of the names of these chars he jumped on if you don’t mind me asking.

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @oldy oldy
item.description:
@oldy wrote:

Crap server. Logged on for about 30mins before getting off.

Its really laggy due to not being on dedi. When asked if he was gonna put it on dedi about 6 times, he finally replied saying that “it wasnt needed. People dont understand you dont need dedi”.

As soon as i logged in Matt jumped on a few chars to make his server look populated. Then even started a new character and was training near me to make it seem as if there was people that actually played. I said “Lame server is lame” to which he replied on his noob char “your lame” then logged.

Same old ignorant admin that hosted many similar rubbish servers before with no playerbase. Not worth even going to the website.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

I was going to play for fun a few days a week like I use to but I changed my mind after meeting one of your main players M e r c y, have fun playing a dead server with a douche running around telling new players to “gtfo” smart move.

I’ve known you for a while from previous servers, please do not come on here to bash my server. If you can’t handle simple talk then thats on you(there is always trash talk on RSC). That is cool if you do not want to play. Im trying to make this server better as i go.
Fixed: maging and ranging through walls, npcs facing you when you talk, npc talk visible to players around the area, you get attacked when maging and ranging npc’s now.
If you like rsc without having to train 50hrs to get a pker or skill then check us out

Read full topic

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Outspoken, post:54, topic:469045”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=586074.msg4182765#msg4182765 date=1355731229]
I never questioned his ability to fix it. If you weren’t mentally retarded you’d see that. His judgement is completely off, and his priorities are wrong. You shouldn’t be hosting events fora week while there is a dupe floating around.

Also, if you don’t recognize what I consider stupid, you are literally retarded. I make it very clear.[/quote]

…

Yeah yeah CodeForFame, everyone is retarded for not agreeing with you, or retarded for not seeing things your way. We get this. Has anyone ever actually cared that you’ve called them “retarded” before? That’s your opinion, and I’ve already established that your opinion means less than dog shit…

I’m tired of talking to you. You’re not going to understand that you’re a jackass. My time is being wasted. I’m gonna show you how to walk away, since clearly you don’t know how or when to.[/quote]As usual, you just make a post that fails to address the points raised, say you don’t care, and then claim you’re going to stop replying… Maybe you should actually try to refute points rather than making completely worthless posts.

BTW this would be the first time, ever, that you stopped replying after the first time you claimed you would.

Read full topic

Also, if you don’t recognize what I consider stupid, you are literally retarded. I make it very clear.[/quote]

…

I’m tired of talking to you. You’re not going to understand that you’re a jackass. My time is being wasted. I’m gonna show you how to walk away, since clearly you don’t know how or when to.

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Outspoken, post:51, topic:469045”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=586074.msg4182675#msg4182675 date=1355719269]

[quote author=Outspoken link=topic=586074.msg4182667#msg4182667 date=1355717884]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=586074.msg4182639#msg4182639 date=1355715194]

ok codeforfame whoever you are i am done talking to you over this issue, if you read my post i said i don’t know exactly how long it was. good day get over it, it is now fixed.[/quote]The point is that it was much longer than a few minutes/hours. A dupe is completely game breaking, and should be fixed immediately.

[quote author=Vibes link=topic=586074.msg4182345#msg4182345 date=1355689998][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=586074.msg4182295#msg4182295 date=1355685895]
My unbiased and golden opinion:

Players should not be blamed or punished for the shortcomings of the Programmers/Developers. Anyone who wishes to have an advantage over the competition would naturally abuse the Glitch.

He was told not to do something with more than one warning, so this is why he is banned. I think it is fair to give someone at least 3 chances before a Ban. Also,he was trying to use telling the dupe to people - against staff members to get what he wanted = not going to be tolerated. Thanks and the Game is still Online for all to play.[/quote]There shouldn’t be a need to warn someone in the first place… The only reason the situation occurred 3 times is because of your incompetence, and failure to fix it in a reasonable period of time.

It’s fixed now, and you’re still going on and on about something that doesn’t matter now. You need to get over it, and yourself.
[/quote]The bug is fixed, sure, but the actual issue isn’t… He didn’t fix a completely game breaking bug, after being informed, for an entire week. Even you should be able to understand how retarded that is…

What do you want him to do about that now? Time travel so that he can fix the issue in a more timely manner? There is nothing that he can do about it now. Leave it alone.
[/quote]I swear, as time goes on you become more mentally challenged… It’s blatantly obvious that I want him to realize that not fixing a dupe, for an entire week, is unacceptable.

No one cares if you find it unacceptable. Not a soul on this Earth cares. You keep repeating yourself over and over like what you say should matter. It doesn’t…

It’s his business how he runs his server. If he wants to wait a week, or a year to fix a bug, that’s his business. Who cares what you think? Certainly not him… He’s not listening to you because it’s none of your business.
I know it’s hard for you to let things go. Ever since I’ve been around you, you’ve had some sort of issue about walking away. Now is the time to get over that and drop it…
[/quote]Imagine if real RuneScape, WoW, or any other large game let a dupe go on for a week… It would be unacceptable, the same applies to a RSCPS.

I personally don’t care how long he waits, I was just stating that it shows how incompetent he is.

Also, it’s not an issue of walking away… It’s an issue with not letting people say stupid shit and get away with it.

I can play with my imagination all day long, but at the end of the day we’re talking about a “fun server” with ~20 players.

That’s your opinion. He could have just been lazy or just couldn’t get around to it until he did. It doesn’t mean that he couldn’t fix the bug, because if he couldn’t fix it, it wouldn’t be fixed right this very second…

So someone said “stupid” things? What were these “stupid” things? I’m curious as to what you would call “stupid” so that you could justify making a fool out of yourself…[/quote]I never questioned his ability to fix it. If you weren’t mentally retarded you’d see that. His judgement is completely off, and his priorities are wrong. You shouldn’t be hosting events fora week while there is a dupe floating around.

Also, if you don’t recognize what I consider stupid, you are literally retarded. I make it very clear.

[quote=“Chronic24, post:52, topic:469045”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=586074.msg4182675#msg4182675 date=1355719269]

[quote author=Outspoken link=topic=586074.msg4182667#msg4182667 date=1355717884]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=586074.msg4182639#msg4182639 date=1355715194]

ok codeforfame whoever you are i am done talking to you over this issue, if you read my post i said i don’t know exactly how long it was. good day get over it, it is now fixed.[/quote]The point is that it was much longer than a few minutes/hours. A dupe is completely game breaking, and should be fixed immediately.

[quote author=Vibes link=topic=586074.msg4182345#msg4182345 date=1355689998][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=586074.msg4182295#msg4182295 date=1355685895]
My unbiased and golden opinion:

Players should not be blamed or punished for the shortcomings of the Programmers/Developers. Anyone who wishes to have an advantage over the competition would naturally abuse the Glitch.

He was told not to do something with more than one warning, so this is why he is banned. I think it is fair to give someone at least 3 chances before a Ban. Also,he was trying to use telling the dupe to people - against staff members to get what he wanted = not going to be tolerated. Thanks and the Game is still Online for all to play.[/quote]There shouldn’t be a need to warn someone in the first place… The only reason the situation occurred 3 times is because of your incompetence, and failure to fix it in a reasonable period of time.

It’s fixed now, and you’re still going on and on about something that doesn’t matter now. You need to get over it, and yourself.
[/quote]The bug is fixed, sure, but the actual issue isn’t… He didn’t fix a completely game breaking bug, after being informed, for an entire week. Even you should be able to understand how retarded that is…

What do you want him to do about that now? Time travel so that he can fix the issue in a more timely manner? There is nothing that he can do about it now. Leave it alone.
[/quote]I swear, as time goes on you become more mentally challenged… It’s blatantly obvious that I want him to realize that not fixing a dupe, for an entire week, is unacceptable.

No one cares if you find it unacceptable. Not a soul on this Earth cares. You keep repeating yourself over and over like what you say should matter. It doesn’t…

It’s his business how he runs his server. If he wants to wait a week, or a year to fix a bug, that’s his business. Who cares what you think? Certainly not him… He’s not listening to you because it’s none of your business.
I know it’s hard for you to let things go. Ever since I’ve been around you, you’ve had some sort of issue about walking away. Now is the time to get over that and drop it…
[/quote]Imagine if real RuneScape, WoW, or any other large game let a dupe go on for a week… It would be unacceptable, the same applies to a RSCPS.

I personally don’t care how long he waits, I was just stating that it shows how incompetent he is.

Also, it’s not an issue of walking away… It’s an issue with not letting people say stupid shit and get away with it.

Dude It’s not a multi-million person game. I think you’re just trying to entertain yourself or something. He has checked every account on the game. It’s all clean. I really don’t see why you are making a big deal of this.

He has a life, Weather he was busy or just didn’t find it too big of a deal. He has made sure people did not mass rare’s etc. Obviously no one on the server has mined great amounts of coal or fish a shit ton of fish… It would be obvious if someone duped the shit out of stuff.

Oi I’m trying to drink and i keep reading the stupid shit you say. Buzz kill much?[/quote]It doesn’t matter how many users there are; the principle still applies. Also, if I dupe some runes, how the hell would you know? Someone could have duped a full set of rune a few time, and it still looks legit.

He was running events instead of fixing a dupe… It’s not that he was busy, it’s that he didn’t think a dupe was important enough to fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @Outspoken Outspoken
item.description:
@Outspoken wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:47, topic:469045”][quote author=Outspoken link=topic=586074.msg4182604#msg4182604 date=1355711978]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=586074.msg4182570#msg4182570 date=1355708657]

ok codeforfame whoever you are i am done talking to you over this issue, if you read my post i said i don’t know exactly how long it was. good day get over it, it is now fixed.[/quote]The point is that it was much longer than a few minutes/hours. A dupe is completely game breaking, and should be fixed immediately.

[quote author=Vibes link=topic=586074.msg4182345#msg4182345 date=1355689998][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=586074.msg4182295#msg4182295 date=1355685895]
My unbiased and golden opinion:

Players should not be blamed or punished for the shortcomings of the Programmers/Developers. Anyone who wishes to have an advantage over the competition would naturally abuse the Glitch.

He was told not to do something with more than one warning, so this is why he is banned. I think it is fair to give someone at least 3 chances before a Ban. Also,he was trying to use telling the dupe to people - against staff members to get what he wanted = not going to be tolerated. Thanks and the Game is still Online for all to play.[/quote]There shouldn’t be a need to warn someone in the first place… The only reason the situation occurred 3 times is because of your incompetence, and failure to fix it in a reasonable period of time.

It’s fixed now, and you’re still going on and on about something that doesn’t matter now. You need to get over it, and yourself.
[/quote]The bug is fixed, sure, but the actual issue isn’t… He didn’t fix a completely game breaking bug, after being informed, for an entire week. Even you should be able to understand how retarded that is…

What do you want him to do about that now? Time travel so that he can fix the issue in a more timely manner? There is nothing that he can do about it now. Leave it alone.
[/quote]I swear, as time goes on you become more mentally challenged… It’s blatantly obvious that I want him to realize that not fixing a dupe, for an entire week, is unacceptable.[/quote]

No one cares if you find it unacceptable. Not a soul on this Earth cares. You keep repeating yourself over and over like what you say should matter. It doesn’t…

It’s his business how he runs his server. If he wants to wait a week, or a year to fix a bug, that’s his business. Who cares what you think? Certainly not him… He’s not listening to you because it’s none of your business.
I know it’s hard for you to let things go. Ever since I’ve been around you, you’ve had some sort of issue about walking away. Now is the time to get over that and drop it…

Read full topic

item.title: Delete please
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

[quote=“Vibes, post:39, topic:469045”][quote author=def pker link=topic=586074.msg4182555#msg4182555 date=1355707661]
lmfao this server was good til i saw the glitches on it and its easy rsc based so its simple how to fix most of it wow i cant believe how much they all rather do an event then take 10 minutes out ur life to fix it. why would anyone play this server. sorry but even project rsc was better then this before i got tired of it
[/quote]
I told you that I am one person, and if you saw or thought there was a glitch or bug then post it on the forums. I was busy when you wanted something done “now”. You never made a post or attempt to, so that i could see all that you said you experienced. It’s ok if you Don’t want to do it that way then it can never be fixed. I always try and look at or implement all suggestions, But it needs to be done the correct way.

ps-Sorry you are not talking to your mom that will do Everything exactly when you say it. something.[/quote]

Lol you are on the server still playing, looks like you chose to be a positive Good to See. I Always look at all suggestions and I will try my best to make the server enjoyable. First they need to be posted. Everyone else Check us out and have some Fun, people are staking and semi pking so far.
